channel.title: No-ip
channel.description:
Hey guys! Could you guys tell me step by step how to connect to my server with my no-ip.biz IP address? I have it in all the places I need it to be but when I connect to my client it just says that it's offline.
If you can't tell me with then could anyone set me up one for me that they'll never use and keep it up as long as you can everyday?
Thanks -Nameme123
*EDIT* - If you help me and your successful you can become an Admin on my server and I'll rep++ you!

item.title: No-ip
item.dc:creator: @thomas27 thomas27
item.description:
@thomas27 wrote:

After you’ve downloaded the DUC (Dynamic Update Client) add your no-ip e-mail and password.
Then make sure it updates to your external IP.

Read full topic

item.title: No-ip
item.dc:creator: @TheSacredKing TheSacredKing
item.description:
@TheSacredKing wrote:

Did you dl the No-Ip? If not you go to there website and click download, select your operating machines, and download it. Then run it and figure out how to use it. Pretty simple though.

Read full topic
